name: The 6th Int'l Conference on Tissue Engineering and Regenerative Medicine
content: The 6th Int'l Conference on Tissue Engineering and Regenerative Medicine (CTERM 2022) will be held from December 16-18, 2022 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Tissue Engineering and Regenerative Medicine. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
